definition: lit. single spear and horse (idiom); fig. single-handed/unaccompanied
surname Shan
bill/list/form/single/only/sole/odd number/CL:個|个[ge4]
gun/firearm/rifle/spear/thing with shape or function similar to a gun/CL:支[zhi1],把[ba3],桿|杆[gan3],條|条[tiao2],枝[zhi1]/to substitute for another person in a test/to knock/classifier for rifle shots
surname Qiang
variant of 槍|枪[qiang1]/rifle/spear
variant of 匹[pi3]/classifier for cloth: bolt
mate/one of a pair
classifier for horses, mules etc/Taiwan pr. [pi1]/ordinary person/classifier for cloth: bolt/horsepower
horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]

sentences.english: It took courage to sail the Atlantic singlehanded .
sentences.chinese: 单枪匹马驶向大西洋需要很大的勇气。

sentences.english: When investing in a business, he always likes to play a lone hand.
sentences.chinese: 在投资时，他总喜欢单枪匹马的去干。

sentences.english: Two time thorough hostile camp's results are single-handedly are encircled.
sentences.chinese: 两次单枪匹马深入敌营的结果都是被围剿。

sentences.english: The scout single-handedly penetrated behind the enemy's rear lines.
sentences.chinese: 侦察员单枪匹马深入敌后。

sentences.english: Anakin continued to hold his own alone, urged to the offensive by Palpatine's goading.
sentences.chinese: 阿纳金单枪匹马，在帕尔帕廷的煽动下占据了上风。

sentences.english: China is single-handedly building post-American world economy.
sentences.chinese: 中国单枪匹马地建立起了后美国时代的经济啊。

sentences.english: I was alone and surrounded and I beat them.
sentences.chinese: 我单枪匹马被围剿，但我打败了他们。

sentences.english: America cannot rescue the world economy alone.
sentences.chinese: 美国不可能单枪匹马拯救世界经济。

sentences.english: One cannot have done it single-handed.
sentences.chinese: 谁也不可能单枪匹马做成这见事的。

sentences.english: There’s no country, I think, who can single-handedly tackle this challenge.
sentences.chinese: 我认为，没有任何国家可以单枪匹马地应付这一挑战。

sentences.english: Negroponte won't have to fight alone.
sentences.chinese: 内格罗蓬特不必单枪匹马地进行斗争。

sentences.english: If you want to play the game well, you have to play with others. You cannot play single-handed and win.
sentences.chinese: 要想赢球，必须同别人合作，不可能靠单枪匹马取胜。

definition: alone/lonely
solitary hero/maverick
alone/by oneself
lit. lone army putting up a brave fight (idiom)/fig. (of a person or group of people) struggling hard without support
to redouble a siege
to storm (a city etc)/to raid
empty hand, empty fist (idiom); having nothing to rely on/unarmed and defenseless
to fight alone (idiom)
to stake all on one throw
to escape unscathed/to get through in one piece
solitary hero/maverick
to rush/to charge/to dash/to break through/to temper oneself (through battling hardships)
to feel in one's pocket and take sth (idiom); as easy as pie/in the bag
to force one's way out of encirclement/to break through
to sweep everything before one/to be invincible (idiom)
lit. newborn calves do not fear tigers (idiom)/fig. the young are fearless
pinyin: chu1 sheng1 niu2 du2 bu4 pa4 hu3
